name: Gingersnap Cookies
instructions: Mix all the dry (Flour to baking soda) together in a bowl
Mix dry ingredients (butter, eggs, vanilla) together in a separate bowl
Combine wet + dry. Then add optional ingredients
In each muffin tin, add a small amount of butter or oil to coat the baking surface
Fill each muffin cup approximately half full with muffin batter
Bake in the oven for 30 minutes until the batter is not mushy on the inside
